name: Snowchaser - The Dark Secret
description:
You wake up in a winter forest and hear screams. What will you do? Snowchaser is an short (~20 minutes) interactive experience. If you play our game ... thank you .. and we hope you have fun. ;)

Controls: 
- Move: WASD
- Run: Shift
- Interact: Left Mouse
- Menu: ESC

#story #winter #snow #adventure #snowchaser #hgbgad1617
